animals.definition: A large gray mammal with a long trunk and tusks
A tall African animal with a long neck and spotted coat
A flightless bird that lives in the Southern Hemisphere

technology.definition: An electronic device for storing and processing data
A mobile phone with advanced computing capabilities
A device for capturing photographs and videos

sports.definition: A sport played with a round ball and hoop
Moving through water using arms and legs
A sport played with rackets and a small ball

food.definition: A flatbread topped with cheese and various ingredients
A Japanese dish of rice and fish wrapped in seaweed
A frozen dessert made from dairy products

transportation.definition: A powered flying vehicle with fixed wings
A two-wheeled vehicle powered by pedals
A series of connected vehicles running on tracks

music.definition: A stringed musical instrument with six strings
A keyboard instrument with black and white keys

professions.definition: A medical professional who treats patients
A professional cook who prepares food

objects.definition: A device used to protect from rain or sun
A collection of printed pages bound together
A device for measuring and displaying time
